Text: Alan Schneider: " and "Tiny Alice"; the American première of Joe Orton's "Entertaining Mr Sloane", Harold Pinter's "The Birthday Party", as well as Pinter's "The Dumb Waiter", "The Collection", and a trilogy of Pinter's plays under the title "Other Places" (including "One for the Road", "Family Voices", and "A Kind of Alaska"); Bertolt Brecht's "The Caucasian Chalk Circle"; "You Know I Can't Hear You When the Water's Running"; and Michael Weller's "Moonchildren" and "Loose Ends".
Triplets:<Alan Schneider
